name: DataEngineerRole
description: Full read/write access to all lakehouse layers and pipeline definitions.

name: DataAnalystRole
description: Read access to silver and gold layers; masked PII fields.

name: DataScientistRole
description: Read access to all layers including bronze; no write; PII shown as hashes.

name: BusinessUserRole
description: Read-only access to gold layer; highly restricted PII visibility.

name: DataGovernanceAdminRole
description: Full governance access: tags, classifications, glossary, policies.
